title: Pixel 4a 5G Fabric case slips off a bit when in my pocket?
content:
My Google Fabric case for the Pixel 4a 5G fits very snuggly. However, when the phone is in my pocket, the right side seems to pop out a bit, often pressing on the power button and switching the phone off which is really annoying.
I'm not sure how this is happening as to pop off the case actually takes a fair bit of pressure, but its happening nearly every day and I only know about it when I take the phone out of my pocket.

Has anyone else experienced this or have a solution?
